topic.title: Ask A Question
topic.text:
This discussion is for you to ask questions of your instructor on the topics of this course.  

During the first two weeks of the course, I will check this discussion every other day for your questions; after the first two weeks, I'll be checking this discussion as you post to it.  If you see a question, and can answer the question, feel free to do so.  

Do not post any questions here about grades!  Remember that there are class members that might have not taken the quiz, or finished the assignment.  If you post about grades, your post will be removed.
